name: Hyrolle
description:
Dice and dice your way through varying kinds of pawns!

In Hyrolle moving and rolling are the same thing! Toss your player character around a little fantasy world.

Attack pawns by rolling into their zone, but be careful to avoid getting hit yourself by swords, arrows, arcane powers or a hot-headed bull.

Collect cards and use their abilities to set lady luck in your favor! Modify your roll or die to improve your chances.

Controls:

  • This game is mouse-only

Made in 48 hours for GMTKJam 2022 by Joeri, Ruben, Wouter and Erik.
